title: Protect the Forests
description: Discover how trees capture CO₂ and support biodiversity.
content: Forests play a vital role in regulating the climate and hosting over 80% of all terrestrial biodiversity.

quiz.question: What percentage of global CO₂ do forests absorb?

title: Protect the Oceans
description: Learn how oceans regulate our climate and sustain life on Earth.
content: Oceans cover 70% of the planet’s surface and produce more than half of the oxygen we breathe.

quiz.question: How much of the Earth’s surface is covered by oceans?
